mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, TYPE FROM( select HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, rcept_bgnde AS SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, rcept_endde AS SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, 'A' as type from APT_LTTOT_PBLANC_DETAIL UNION select HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, 'R' as type from REMNDRLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL UNION select HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, 'U' as type from URBTYOFCTLLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL ) WHERE HSSPLY_ADRES like '%'||#{localName}||'%' ORDER BY HOUSE_MANAGE_NO DESC

SELECT SUM(COUNT) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, rcept_bgnde, rcept_endde FROM APT_LTTOT_PBLANC_DETAIL WHERE HSSPLY_ADRES LIKE '%'||#{localName}||'%' ORDER BY HOUSE_MANAGE_NO DESC) UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE FROM REMNDRLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL WHERE HSSPLY_ADRES LIKE '%'||#{localName}||'%' ORDER BY HOUSE_MANAGE_NO DESC) UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, HOUSE_NM, HSSPLY_ADRES, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE FROM URBTYOFCTLLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL WHERE HSSPLY_ADRES LIKE '%'||#{localName}||'%' ORDER BY HOUSE_MANAGE_NO DESC) )
